title: Premios PLATINO
overview: The Premios PLATINO are organized by EGEDA (Entidad de Gestión de Derechos de los Productores Audiovisuales) and the Federación Iberoamericana de Productores Cinematográficos y Audiovisuales (FIPCA), with the support of the Academies and Film Institutes of Ibero-America. Their objective is to promote and disseminate Ibero-American cinematography and the audiovisual industry, boosting its recognition and expansion worldwide. Over the years, the awards have been hosted in Panama, Spain, Uruguay, and Mexico, bringing together the most prominent figures in the sector.
